tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We  know Dr Varsha Saxena from last last eight years we taken  for my elder son and continue for my second baby her treatment and suggestions are always best. Worth every penny no extra talk Best Doctor in Hsr layout

Best doctor I've ever been to.  Dr. Varsha is an educated and kind doctor who takes the time to listen to me and give me proper advice.  She can obviously prescribe allopathic medicine but then also knows so much about natural remedies for common problems such as colds, burns etc.

She is a very supportive and friendly person.Dr. Varsha is one-of-a-kind. She is warm, compassionate and sincere and deeply cares about each of her patients. Dr. varsha is in the right field. Her personality and commitment is what every parent should expect from a pediatrician. If I can use the word "perfect" as an under title for Dr. varsha, it would not be fair because that title would not do her justice. She is so much more than that. She truly is a gift sent from above. God bless Dr. varsha and keep her healthy for children's benefit. Thank you

 Dr. Varsha is not only the single best doctor I have ever encountered in my life, but she is also one of the finest human beings I have ever met.  After leaving my last doctor's practice because my visits with him consisted of his sticking his head in the door.I would love to recommend Dr Varsha to ,my friends

 Dr. Varsha  is so positive about body image and self-acceptance. She is incredibly knowledgeable about alternative medicine as well, and equally creative in her treatment.  You know she genuinely cares about you as an individual, and doesn't just see you as her next appointment.

We have been consulting Dr.Varsha for over 3 years now. She is an excellent paediatrician who is very caring, listens patiently to the concerns, diagnoses well, and advises/ suggests long term cures. She has been approachable at all times and available. 
She has well knowledge about alternative medicine for the child and is equally careful in her treatment. In simple terms she has been lucky for our daughter as she is cured with any medicine she administers and she genuinely cares for her well being.
I have and would definitely recommend Dr Varsha to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I get to know about you from practo review and my friend. But my experience was very bad. 1. On 3rd Sep , it was a second meet and I went only to clear some doubts about my baby. But you don't have time to listen all the problem. I know everything(Vomiting,eye rash etc) is normal and we are happy but your irritation was getting high time by time . So please try to clear all doubts with patience, not only to meet another patient. And most important, please ask all the parents in the end if they have anything to clear about their baby.2. I know , you are a experienced doctor and know everything but that doesn't mean you'll touch inside baby's mouth without using sanitizer. Not only you, please inform your clinic people also to use sanitizer before touching anyone's baby.3. First meet (16th Aug):- It is already more than 15 days but I didn't get bill for vaccination. I already asked your receptionist so many times in phone and also asked physically when I went second time . your receptionist told me ,she will send me bill immediately but didn't send any bill. Again I asked her but same reply "I'LL SEND YOU".  So it is clear ,you are hiding something from us.4. I am not complaining about you, it is a request to bring some change.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Children's Health,Paediatric care,Paediatric & Family Counselling,Paediatric EmergencyÂ  Care,Consultation provided for newborns ,
review:
We are seeing Dr Varsha from last 2 years after moving back from Singapore. My first kids was having childhood asthma and it got aggravated after moving to Bangalore. He was getting constantly getting cold and cough. Dr Varsha helped us a lot in improving his condition. She was available for us on whatsapp when required. She gave us lot of tips on do's and dont's.  She was listening all our concerns and try to address all. We are always very thankful to Dr Varsha. 
Now we have blessed second baby boy. After initial pediatric from the hospital , we immediately switched to Dr Varsha for further consultation. Every time She is thoroughly examining the baby and patiently answering 
 all our queries. Her guidance is really helpful in taking care of new born baby. 

Thank you very much Dr

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
After a long and hard search we found a very good pediatrician for our daughter. We have been consulting with Dr. Varsha Saxena for the past few months now. Every time we have been to her she had always taken the time out to explain her diagnosis and answer all our questions. 
She is very patient *** ************** The most important aspect that we love about her is that she does not prescribe any unnecessary tests or medications and doesn't give any antibiotics unless absolutely required. 
*** ** *** **** ************* ** **** **** Would definitely recommend her!
Highly recommend and appreciate the assistance of doctor Varsha. She has treated Nitya well. Happy to consult again in need.

We went to check baby's health as she used to vomit 2-3 times in a week. Dr.varsha is very professional and caring. She diagnosed it very well and checked vaccination calendar and provided one missed vaccine with care. I recommend Dr.Varsha for issue related child.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The doctor hears you very patiently. She is very friendly and is conversant in English as well as Hindi. She has good experience in handling infants.

She sits in her personal clinic as well as in Narayana Hospital, HSR. The charges are quite reasonable in her personal clinic. 

The wait time is not much and within max 30 minutes doctor sees you if you have a prior appointment.

Our 4 years old son was having High Fever with severe cold and throat pain....

Doctor examined my son and told that he is having throat infection immediately.

 Within a day fever came down.....

Doctor is patient and listened carefully what we are saying....

Dr. Varsha was very nice and friendly. She listened to all our queries and answered them in details. She has prescribed very less medicine, explained how to resolve the problems naturally. Also advised us on some other things on her own, which we were not aware of.

she treats you as a whole being--not as someone who is short of a preconceived health ideal.  When I sometimes don't take care of myself, I see genuine concern in her eyes, rather than the "tsk tsk," I've gotten from so many practitioners in the past.  My life and health are worth every penny.I am happy that that she is young, and will not be retiring on me any time soon.Like everyone else here, I cannot say enough about Dr Varsha and about this practice.

We found her when we were searching for a pediatrician for our baby. Waited in crowds of people in many cold waiting rooms. Met many overworked late tired doctors.  Until we met Dr Varhsa.

The practice is intentionally small and so warm and caring. Dr Swan spends a long time with you -- and you feel like you're the only thing in her day at that moment. We loved her manner and experience and caring with our requirement.

Dr. Varsha is the best, most attentive, caring, whole-person treating doctor I've ever had. She's got an unusual mix of being a top-educated doctor plus a kind, empathetic human being. I have never felt so well taken care of.

The best feeling is going there and knowing she's treating your whole being -- if I have one ailment somewhere, she still checks in on progress with other issues, and by the end of the 30 or 45 minutes, I feel so well attended to!

I would not hesitate to recommend anyone to Dr Swan and to this practice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly and the clinic is located in a calm neighborhood. Wait time was hardly anything and the doctor listened to and addressed all our queries patiently. Baby was examined promptly and throughly and all vitals taken. Would recommend her and the clinic in HSR for children.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Varsha was quite thorough in her examination and spent decent amount of time in doing her checks. She didn't just ask us to track the child's fever for a couple of days and come back if it doesn't go away. That is the response that we usually got from other paediatricians. The appointment was also right on time and we didn't have to wait. Overall it was a wonderful experience.

review: We are very happy with the doctor. My kid is 15 months now and we used to consult this doctor right from the first month of my kid. We never thought of having second opinion with anyone as she is very good in diagnosing the problems and her medicine prescription always worked.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is just the best. Everything I walk in her clinic or consult her there is a solution which helps in my childs' quick and eraly recovery. Her diagnosis and treatment is always precise.

Totally Professional, with proper attention and perfect diagnosis.
My kid was suffering from cough and cold since long time and after first meet with the doctor itself he started getting relief with the prescribed medicines. She is too good with her profession and I do recommend her for treatment.

Dr. Varsha has become kind of family doctor for us. We have been consulting her since 2011 and for any problem of my daughter she is the saviour. She is such a soft spoken and nice at heart too. I personally recommended many of my friends and they are also very happy with her. I recommend her for any paediatric problems.

Actually we went for my daughter to give her vaccination they taken money more than M.R.P price by the way taking consultation also they taken 1700 rs more. actual price of vaccination is 1200 for 2 vaccines one is pentavac and rotateq 500 more they taken this is not at all good.
reply_text: The current (2017) MRP of Pentavac PFS vaccine (serum institute)  is Rs 640 and Rotateq (MerK USA) is Rs 1000. Apart from this Polio drops was also given to the child. You are most welcome to take the boxes of the injection given to the child and any further query regarding this.

review:
The Doctor is heard us very calmly, without coming to any conclusion, examined the kid, prescribed low dose medicine without antibiotics .
The medicines prescribed started giving results in the 1st dose itself and within 3 doses my kid was relieved.
Thanks Dr.Varsha

She listens to your problems, is patient with the child and provides her feedback only after a thorough diagnosis. She is very calm and makes all the right suggestions. The medication she has prescribed has always been easy to find *** ** **** ********** ** ***** *** **** ********* ********* ********* ** **** ********* ** **** **** **** *** ***** ********** ** ***** *** ***** ** **** *** ** *** ******** ******* *****

She didn't push for unnecessary tests but rather recommended them only if the symptoms aggravated. The medicines she suggested were able to help my child recover from fever fast and without any side effects.

We have been consulting Dr Varsha for my son soon after his birth. She is a very nice doctor and keeps track of the illness record (not one the doc; but in her mind). Cheers,
Prasad

I have visited Dr. Varsha several times. I have always had good experience with her. The clinic is good and staff is polite. Doctor is patient and friendly, explains the problem and solution well.
